statements: UPDATE electric_vehicles SET vehicle_name = 'Tesla Model 3', energy_efficiency_rating = 4.5 WHERE vehicle_id = 1;
UPDATE electric_vehicles SET energy_efficiency_rating = 3.8, vehicle_name = 'Chevrolet Bolt EV' WHERE vehicle_id = 2;
UPDATE electric_vehicles SET energy_efficiency_rating = 5.70, vehicle_name = 'Tesla Model S' WHERE vehicle_id = 1
UPDATE electric_vehicles SET vehicle_name = 'Nissan Leaf', energy_efficiency_rating = 4.25 WHERE vehicle_id = 2
UPDATE electric_vehicles SET efficiency_rating = 4.5, range = '200 miles' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE vehicle_ratings SET overall_rating = 4.2, energy_efficiency_rating = 3.8, performance_rating = 4.5 WHERE vehicle_id = 2;
UPDATE electric_vehicles SET brand='Tesla', name='Model S', efficiency_rating=4.5, range='300 miles' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE vehicle_ratings SET overall_rating=4.8, design_rating=4.5, performance_rating=4.7 WHERE vehicle_id=1;
UPDATE electric_vehicles SET efficiency_rating = 4.5 WHERE model_name = 'Tesla Model S';
UPDATE charging_stations SET availability = true, voltage = 220.50 WHERE location = 'California';
UPDATE electric_vehicles SET brand='Tesla', efficiency_rating=4.5 WHERE id=1;
UPDATE charging_stations SET availability=true, location='New York', voltage=220.5 WHERE id=3;
UPDATE electric_vehicles SET brand='Tesla', energy_efficiency_rating=5 WHERE id=1;
UPDATE consumer_reviews SET rating=4, review_text='Great vehicle with excellent performance' WHERE vehicle_id=3;
UPDATE electric_vehicles SET energy_efficiency_rating = 5 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE charging_stations SET available_connectors = 10, charging_speed = 'Fast' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE electric_vehicles SET price = 25000.00 WHERE vehicle_id = 1;
UPDATE ratings SET safety_rating = 4, energy_rating = 5 WHERE vehicle_id = 2;
UPDATE electric_vehicles SET price = price * 0.9, manufacturer = 'Tesla' WHERE vehicle_id = 1;
UPDATE vehicle_history SET previous_owners = previous_owners + 1, purchase_date = CURRENT_DATE WHERE vehicle_id = 3;
